ovdesc.p: The IBANPLUS file contains IBAN-related data for financial institutions to generate or validate the IBAN number.

desc.p: A flag which indicates whether there is a change in the record, since the last release of the IBAN structure file.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A - Addition since last IBAN structure file.
D - Deletion since last IBAN structure file.
U - Unchanged since last IBAN structure file.
M - Modification since last IBAN structure file.
E - Expired : Reserved for future use.

desc.p: Specifies the Institution name of the IBAN issuer.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 35 characters can be entered.

desc.p: Residence Country Name of the financial institution that issued the IBAN.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 35 characters can be entered.

desc.p: Residence Country code of the financial institution that issued the IBAN.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 2 characters can be entered.

desc.p: The country code of the IBANs that the institution issued.
Under certain circumstances this can be different from the country indicated in field "ISO COUNTRY CODE".
Banks in Guernsey (GG) issue IBANs using GB when the clearing system in Great Britain is used.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 2 characters can be entered.

desc.p: This is the BIC Code issued together with the IBANs to the institution's clients.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 11 characters can be entered.

desc.p: Contains the ROUTING BIC which is the best approximation to send SEPA payment over SWIFT, when IBAN BIC is not connected to SWIFT.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 11 characters can be entered.

desc.p: Specifies the National ID that is included in the IBAN.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 35 characters can be entered.

desc.p: Code indicating the context of the payment services provided by the financial institution.
SEPA - Single Euro Payments Area
NULL - The institution uses the IBAN standard but is not a participant of SEPA.
Validation Rules:

p.p: A maximum of 4 characters can be entered.

desc.p: This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a multi valued field.
Contains details of any override applicable to this record.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered. This is a NOINPUT field.
